column1: von. dell rogers| von. dell rogers passed away thursday
column4: at the age of 83. graveside services were held at throckmorton cemetery at 2:00 p. m.
column7: 2015 under the direction of smith family funeral homes. von. dell was born july 2
column9: texas to archie and lassie martin. she is preceded in death by her parents; one brother
column10: kenneth aubry martin; and life long companion
column11: ray walling. von. dell is survived by her daughter
column14: matt rogers and wife margaret of wichita falls
column19: abby and carson rogers. online condolences can be shared with von. dells family at www. smithfamilyfh. com.
